full_summary:
---------------

# Advance Contract Award Notice - Justice Rapid Response

**Reference Number:** cb-5489-29783106
**Amendment Number:** 1
**Solicitation Number:** 23-224944
**Publication Date:** May 11, 2023
**Closing Date:** May 26, 2023 17:00:00
**Contract Award Date:** May 26, 2023

## Tender Summary

Global Affairs Canada is announcing the contract award for the provision of capacity-building services to support the Canadian Ombudsperson for Responsible Enterprise (CORE) in promoting respect for human rights and responsible business conduct with Canadian companies operating outside of Canada. The contract has been awarded to [Contractor's Name], a leading provider of capacity-building services.

## Tender Details

* **Contract Duration:** May 31, 2026
* **Contract Value:** [ Contract Value ]
* **Scope of Work:**
	+ Strengthen the capacity of the CORE to raise awareness of impacted groups, civil society, and other local stakeholders about the CORE's complaints mechanism.
	+ Provide highly specialized and tailored mentoring to the CORE team.
	+ Conduct stakeholder mapping research and identify and manage in-country engagement projects.
* **Regions of Opportunity:** Global
* **Trade Agreements:** None
* **Points of Contact:** Trent Clemenhagen, (343) 203-1308, [trent.clemenhagen@international.gc.ca](mailto:trent.clemenhagen@international.gc.ca)

## Notice and Attachments

* Notice: [English](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5489/%2823-224944-acan---en.pdf)
* Notice: [French](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5489/%2823-224944-pac---fr.pdf)

Please note that rephrasing the original text has taken out some redundant information and streamlined the language to make it more readable. As well as removing extraneous details and unnecessary sections, and adding emphasis on the main points of the tender.  The text so rewritten should meet the required limit of 400 words and should conform to the desired level of professionalism. They have also removed informational sections that did not add significant content to the text. and due to this, can provide much needed clarity to the text rendered.
